qt_add_qml_module(Arrays
    STATIC
    PLUGIN_TARGET Arrays
    URI "gen.arrays"
    VERSION 1.0
    SOURCES
        Connection.cpp
        DBusError.cpp
        ArraysInterface.cpp
        ArraysInterfaceAdaptor.cpp
        ArraysWithStructsInterface.cpp

        SimonsArray.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(Arrays PRIVATE Qt6::DBus)
